headline: Issues with Buy 3 get 1 free deals
review: I purchased this Colgate toothpaste in January to use it over a period of 6 months or so. This special deal comes with 4 individually packed toothpaste tubes. The first 3 packets I used over a period of 4 to 5 months were fine. However, the toothpaste tube in the last packet I opened after about 5 months was damaged. By this time the return period was over. Hence, I do not have any option other that writing this review. I have purchased such deals in the past. However, this is the first time I had this issue. So my rating is only for this consignment.

headline: Teeth have not really whitened as advertised
5-stars for the latest pack (manufactured just 1 month ago) and prompt delivery.
review:
Tooth paste are mostly personal choice. So, this rating is merely my opinion.

5-stars for the latest pack (manufactured just 1 month ago) and prompt delivery.
By mistake I placed order for 2 -quantity (So, total I got two packs each having two with-in it). But, this item is not return eligible - that means, you can't return tooth-paste.

Though the taste-and-smell are decades old, I like the way it cleans - proper abrasive material is contained. This tooth past works best when used with Soft tooth brush.

headline: Go to product for the family!
review:
Product is fine. Cleans your teeth well. Not too runny. It's perfect.

The only shortcoming was that I ordered for 200gm+200gm+100gm pack but one was missing from the pack. So be cautious while you order.
Rest, the product is absolutely fine. I like it. So I would recommend all. Use it and decide yourself.
